result.reason: RDP ActiveX control (MSTSCLib) has known limitations in printer redirection compared to full mstsc.exe client — this is a Microsoft COM component limitation, not an mRemoteNG bug
result.approach: The RedirectPrinters boolean is correctly passed to AdvancedSettings2.RedirectPrinters. The ActiveX control does not support the same printer enumeration as mstsc.exe. No code fix available — would require Microsoft to update the COM component or mRemoteNG to switch to a custom RDP implementation.

attempts.raw_output:
This is a known limitation of the RDP ActiveX control (`AdvancedSettings2.RedirectPrinters`). The boolean `RedirectPrinters` property on the MSTSC ActiveX control is a simple on/off toggle — it doesn't offer the same level of printer enumeration and redirection that the full `mstsc.exe` client does. This is a Microsoft RDP ActiveX control limitation, not a bug in mRemoteNG's code. The code correctly passes the setting through. The discrepancy in printer counts between servers is due to server-side printer driver availability combined with how the ActiveX control negotiates printer redirection differently than `mstsc.exe`.
